statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); git_branch=$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); printf '\033[2m%s@%s\033[0m:\033[34m%s\033[0m%s \033[2m[%s]\033[0m' "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$(basename "$current_dir")" "$([ -n "$git_branch" ] && printf " \033[32m(%s)\033[0m" "$git_branch" || echo '')" "$model"
